mgICurveString.h

ICurveSegmentAbstract
ICurveString

END_NAMESPACE_OSGEO_GEOMETRY BEGIN_NAMESPACE_OSGEO_GEOMETRY public __gc __interface ICurveString
 

The ICurveString class is a CurveString Geometry type. ICurveString is the most general non-abstract curve type. It is defined by an ordered collection of contiguous curve segments.
